description: React component for star (or any other icon based) ratings
name: react-star-rating-component

scripts.build: npm run build-babel && npm run build-dist-dev && npm run build-dist-prod
scripts.build-example: browserify ./example/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-1 react ] --plugins [ transform-object-assign ] ] | uglifyjs -cm > ./example/bundle.min.js
